attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Given that it is inevitable that Iraq will further descend into civil war, partition and ethic cleansing of the Sunni population, we petition the Prime Minister to declare victory in the South of Iraq and to withdraw our troops, in order that:
a) No more of our troops' lives are pointlessly wasted.
b) We get out before the last American helicopter leaves the embassy roof, and with some shreds of dignity.

government_responses.details:
You recently signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "withdraw our troops from Iraq."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here:
http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page10866.asp

Prime Minister's Office

Petition info: http://petitions.pm.gov.uk/troopsout/
